text: Iʙrohim va Ja'quʙ ʙa farzandoni xud ʙa in kalima vasijat kardand, «Ej farzandoni man, Alloh ʙaroi şumo in dinro ixtijor kardaast, va in dini islom ast, ki Muhammad (sallallohu alajhi va sallam) ʙa in din omad va dar ajjomi zindagiaton az on çudo maşaved, pas az in çahon namired, magar in ki şumo farmonʙardor ʙoşed». (Ja'ne, dar dini islom ʙoşed)
